NO_ITEMS.TITLE: No Knowledge Items Found
NO_ITEMS.MESSAGE: You don't have any knowledge items at the moment. New items will appear here once created.

NO_SCHEDULED.MESSAGE: You don't have any scheduled knowledge items at the moment.
NO_SCHEDULED.FILTERED_MESSAGE: No scheduled items match your search criteria. Try a different search term.

NO_POSTED.TITLE: No Posted Items Found
NO_POSTED.MESSAGE: You don't have any posted knowledge items at the moment.
NO_POSTED.FILTERED_MESSAGE: No posted items match your search criteria. Try a different search term.

NO_PACKAGES.TITLE: No Packages Found
NO_PACKAGES.MESSAGE: You don't have any knowledge packages at the moment. Create a package by using the 'Generate Package' button.

MY_DOWNLOADS.SELECT_KNOWLEDGE: Select a knowledge item to view documents

EMPTY_DASHBOARD.TITLE: Start Building Your knowledge library

PROFILE.SUPPORTED_FORMATS: Supported formats: PDF, DOC, DOCX, JPG, PNG

EMAIL_RECONFIRM.TITLE: Email Verification Required
EMAIL_RECONFIRM.DESCRIPTION: Please verify your email address to access all features
EMAIL_RECONFIRM.FORM_SUBTITLE: We need to verify your email address before you can continue
EMAIL_RECONFIRM.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Verification email sent successfully. Please check your inbox and spam folder.
EMAIL_RECONFIRM.ERROR_MESSAGE: Failed to send verification email. Please try again.
EMAIL_RECONFIRM.VERIFIED_SUCCESS: Your email has been verified successfully!
EMAIL_RECONFIRM.AUTH_ERROR: Authentication error. Please log in again.
EMAIL_RECONFIRM.VERIFICATION_REQUIRED: Please verify your email address to continue.
EMAIL_RECONFIRM.PROFILE_ERROR: Unable to load profile information. You can still try to resend the verification email.
